section.title: Tracking
section.content: We are able to track bees in a hive video by utilizing DeepSORT algorithm along with a YOLOv7 model trained on our bees. We manage to find and track %90 of bees by giving each of them a unique id on a hive video regardless of its duration.

section.title: Tagging
section.content: We have a tool to tag individual bees during a video manually to create a ground truth data. This mechanism provide an option to measure tracking performance.

section.title: Visualization
section.content: Ant Design is a React UI library that has a lot of easy-to-use components for building elegant UI.

section.title: Comparison
section.content: We have a comparison tool to measure tracking performance by selecting a bee. Comparison tool uses Dynamic Time Wrapping algorithm to calculate tracking error.
